title: ESF國際學校感謝警務人員的忠誠勇毅

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/RenaissanceCollegeHK/videos/300505450954631/

Our ever-compassionate Secondary students wrote Thank You notes to those frontliners combating the spread of COVID-19 from medical workers, policemen, firemen to patients in isolation and under quarantine - Thank you all and stay strong! #compassionatestudents #speedyrecovery #RCHKcommunity
